name: Jean-Baptiste Tristan
content: Jean-Baptiste Tristan I am interested in program verification (especially in Lean), randomized/probabilistic algorithms, reinforcement learning, and compilers. I am the co-recipient of the 2022 Programming Languages Software Award and the 2021 ACM Software System Award . Publications ICSE'25 Formally Verified Cloud-Scale Authorization Aleks Chakarov, Jaco Geldenhuys, Matthew Heck, Michael Hicks, Samuel Huang, Georges-Axel Jaloyan, Anjali Joshi, K. Rustan M. Leino, Mikael Mayer, Sean McLaughlin, Akhilesh Mritunjai, Clement Pit-Claudel, Sorawee Porncharoenwase, Florian Rabe, Marianna Rapoport, Giles Reger, Cody Roux, Neha Rungta, Robin Salkeld, Matthias Schlaipfer, Daniel Schoepe, Johanna Schwartzentruber, Serdar Tasiran, Aaron Tomb, Emina Torlak, Jean-Baptiste Tristan, Lucas Wagner, Michael W.
